name: my-app
description: My App is a continuously updated personal service collection.
author: jinyaoMa

scripts.design:build: pnpm --filter @jinyaoma/my-app-design exec vue-tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter @jinyaoma/my-app-design exec vite build
scripts.update:dependencies: pnpm up -r --latest && go get -u && go mod tidy
scripts.install:certs: mkdirp backend/web/certs && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 36524 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout backend/web/certs/localhost.key -out backend/web/certs/localhost.crt -subj "//SKIP=skip/CN=localhost"
scripts.install: pnpm install:assets && pnpm install:frontend && pnpm install:certs && pnpm install:docs && pnpm install:build
scripts.preinstall: pnpm preinstall:air && pnpm preinstall:wails && pnpm preinstall:swag
